alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kent, southeastern Queen Anne`s and northeastern Caroline Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 308 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greensboro, or 15 miles east of Centerville, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denton, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Goldsboro, Jumptown, Griffin, Sandtown, Hope, Hillsboro and Henderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
